levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces a little</> and the activation rate of this unit's Talent increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale:0.0}</> times. <$ba.root>Bound</> enemies within Attack Range receive Arts damage equal to <@ba.vup>{indigo_s_2[damage].atk_scale:0%}</> of Indigo's ATK every <@ba.vup>{indigo_s_2[damage].interval}</> seconds
